chapter.text: U. S Leqwoan id ismektayen
Xaii, wid ijehlen, atnan di tem$weo d ticuina
Aceal isuta ay Nesqucc, uqbel nnsen! Ssawlen d. Ur mazal akud i leslak
Wehmen, iusa ten id uneddao segsen. Nnan ijehliyen: "wagi d aseeear, d akeddab
Aani ad irr ioebbiten, d Oebbi Yiwen? Ayagi d ayen issewhamen
Kkren imeqwoanen segsen, nnan: "eleut, illit d imezgiyen ar ioebbiten nnwen. Ayagi, d ayen iwatan
Ur nesli i waya, di ddin aneggaru. Ihi, aya, siwa asnulfu
Day, garane$, d neppa iwumi d irs usmekti"? Xaii, nitni di ccekk, $ef usmekti W, mazal ur jeooben ara aaaqeb iW
Ne$ saan lexzayen ueunu n Mass ik, Uzmir, A$eyyat
Ne$, nnsen tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen? Anef ad alin ihi, s imraren
Nitni siwa d iaeskoiwen imexsuoen, seg ikabaren
Zwaren ten id, ar uskiddeb, agdud n Nue, Aad, Feraun bu ibudiden
Tamud, agdud n Lui, At Laika; d widak ay d ikabaren
Akw, skaddben imazanen, ihi, iwata uaaqeb iW
Wigi, ad gganin kan ti$oi yiwet, ur as ippili wallus
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! £iwwel ane$ deg umur nne$, uqbel ass iqeiiiyen
Eubeo i wayen d qqaoen. Mmekti d amdan nne£ Dawed, bab n tezmert. Ih, Neppa ippales
Ih, Neeppem i idurar ad sbuccuaen yides, tameddit, tafara
Ifoax mlalen. Akw, i Neppa, ppalsen
Nesseohed tagelda s, Nefka ias uuwab, awal iqaaden
Ma ibbwev ik id usali n yixuimen, mi ulin ar tmezgida
Mi kecmen ar Dawed, iugad iten. Nnan: "ur ppagwad, d sin ixuimen, yiwen degne$, ijuo $ef wayev. Eekem garane$ s tidep, war taneeyaft. Enhu ya$ s abrid umain
Ihi, gma yagi, isaa tza u tzat n wulli, nek tixsi yiwet. Inna yi d: kwellef iyi p. Irna yi s wawal

Inna: "ni$ idens ik s usuter n texsi inek, a p irnu ar wulli ines. Aias n yicriken i ippemjuoen, siwa wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, drus nnsen ay llan". Ifhem Dawed Njeooeb it kan; iste$feo Mass is, i$li, iiianez, indem
Nsemmee as ayagi. Ih, i neppa, $uone£, amkan n tu$alin aqoib, umain

A Dawed, Nerra k, ih, d agensas di tmurt. Eudd ger imdanen s tidep, ur iiafao lhawiyya, a k tetlef seg ubrid n Oebbi. Ihi, wid innetlafen seg ubrid n Oebbi, fellasen aaaqeb uqsie, imi ppun ass iqeiiiyen
Ur Nexliq tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, di rrayaa, akken nwan wid ijehlen. A tawa$it n tmes, i wid ijehlen
Day a Nerr wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, am wid issefsaden di ddunit? Ne$ a Nerr wid ipeezziben am laaouo
Tazmamt Nessers ak p id, teoqa, iwakken ad meyyzen issekniyen is, a d mmektin uaqilen
N$at Dawed s Sliman, amdan ukiys ippalsen
Mi s d sseknen, tameddit, tigmarin laali
inna: "nek, smenyafe$ tayri n wayla, i usmekti n Mass iw, armi sberbren fellasent
Erret pent id $uoi". Igezm asent ivaoen, timegrav
Ni$, Njeooeb Sliman; Nessers loeppa af usgeld is. Iu$al indem
Inna: "a Mass iw! Semmee iyi, £it iyi s tgelda ur nepuae yiwen, deffir i. S tidep, Kecc d A$iyyat
Nenub fellas s wavu. Ipuuvu, s lameo is, d abeeri, s anda i s ihwa
Ccwaien akw ibennun, ip$emmisen
Wiyad pwarzen, s slasel
Tagi d tikci nne£. Efk ne$ eiief, war aktili
Ih, i neppa, $uone£, amkan n tu$alin aqoib, umain
Mmekti d amdan nne£ Yub, mi inaao Mass is: "nek, ieuza yi Cciian, s cedda akked uaaqeb
Aafes s uvao ik, wagi d amkan semmven, i tarda u i tissit
N$at it s twacult is, akked yides tin i p icban, d aeunu s$uone£, d asmekti i uaqilen
Eddem deg ufus ik taseiia, ewwet yis ur eennet". Ni$ Nufa t d aueboi, d amdan amxallef ippalsen
Mmekti d imdanen nne£: Iboahim, Iseaq, Iaaqub. D imawlan n tezmert akked yieoi
Ih, Nueffa ten, s uufawa usmekti n Uxxam
Nitni, $uone£, war ccekk, seg wid iufraren, i Nefren
Mmekti d: Ismaail, Lyasaa, Du-al-Kifl. Akw, seg wid Nefren
Wagi d asmekti. Ih, i wid ipeezziben, tisin igerzen mavi
leonanat n Aaden. Llin asen tibbura
Ad ttekkin dinna. Ad ssutren degsen; izwayen s lufa, akked tisit
£uosen, sut wallen ibran, ppizyiwin
D wagi i wen ippuwaaaden, i wass iqeiiiyen
D wagi, s tidep, ay d l$it nne£, ur nepfukku
Akka. Wanag, i iqehhaoen, tisin icemten mavi
Loahennama, ad degs o$en; a yir usu
Akka, ad jeooben aman ippayzagen, akked wid ipfueun
akked wayen nniven i ten icban, d tiyugiwin
Atan urbaa i iddehmen yidwen, ur anuuf yissen. Ih, di tmes ad o$en
Nnan: "xaii, ur anuuf yiswen, kunwi! D kunwi i $ p id iheggan". A yaxxam adiran
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! Saaddi berdayen aaaqeb n tmes, $ef wid i $ d iheggan aya
Nnan: "acu i $ iu$en, ur nwala ara irgazen, i nella neesb iten seg imcumen mavi
Day nemsexxeo fellasen, ne$ dergen i wallen
Ih, aya d tidep, d amqellaa n at tmes
Ini: "nek, d aneddao kan. Ur illi oebbi siwa Oebbi, Yiwen, Aqehhao
Mass n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, Uzmir Ipsemmieen
Ini: "d asali ameqwoahan
Kunwi, teooam t
Ur illi wayen eoi$ $eo le$wat aalayen meooa, mi mqellaan
Ppuweeea$ d kan, ar nek d aneddao ipbegginen
Mi Inna Mass ik i lmalayek: "Nek ad Xelqe$ amdan, si talaxt
Mi t Mesle$, Suve$ degs, si ooue iW, iinzemt $uoes, s lekni
Knant akw lmalayek, akken ma llant
siwa Iblis i izuxxen, illa seg ijehliyen
Inna: "A Iblis, w ik igedlen lekni i win Xelqe$ s ifassen iW? Tzuxxev, ne$ telliv seg wid iufraren
Inna: "Nek ife$ t. Txelqev iyi si tmes, Txelqev t si talaxt
Inna: "Effe$ segs, kecc d imenfi
Inna: "fellak xezzu, alamma d ass iqeiiiyen
Inna: "A Mass iw, eoo iyi ar ass ideg ara d kkren
Inna: "kecc, ih, seg wid Ooi
ar ass n wukud ipwassnen
Inna: "s tezmert iK, a ten $ewwu$, akken ma llan
siwa imdanen iK izedganen segsen
Inna: "tidep, d tidep ay Nni
Ad Acare$ Loahennama yissek, akked wid, segsen, i k ivefoen, akken ma llan
Ini: "ur awen ssutre$ taqdiat af waya. Ur lli$, nek, seg wid ippestaamilen
Neppa, s tidep, d asmekti kan i imavalen
Mi taadda tallit, war ccekk, a kwen id iawev usali s
